ECOSYSTEM_ACTORS.TITLE: Ecosystem Actors
ECOSYSTEM_ACTORS.DESCRIPTION: The ecosystem actors dataset contains a list of all the organisations and companies that have been identified and analysed. It features the ecosystem actor name, website, contact details, and relevant Sustainable Development Goals.

SDG_REFERENCES.TITLE: SDG References
SDG_REFERENCES.DESCRIPTION: The SDG references dataset contains a list of all the webpages where a link to the Sustainable Development Goals was detected. It features the URL of the webpage, the matched SDG, and the discovered keywords.
